name: Bankless T-Shirt
description:
Remember April Fools, 2021? The Bank + Bankless collaboration is the most iconic team-up that will never be.
Breakups are usually hard. Will you ever be loved the same way? Can I really be sure that it's not my fault after all? We've all been through it one way or another before. It is always a tough call. But not this one. If you're worth your salt and know your shit (which, if you're buying with us, we know you do), go ahead boo - break up with your bank and go wild. You don't need one when all of Ethereum's got your back. Raise a glass to a better, bolder, Bankless version of you ðŸ˜˜
